title: Happy Birthday, Lanzhu-senpai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Fufufu~♪ Perfect timing, Kasumi! Here. Lanzhu will hold a birthday party today, so make sure to come to the place written on there after our club activities♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh!? But we were already organizing your birthday party ourselves....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eh!? It’s my birthday, so it’s obvious Lanzhu should be the one to invite and show you my hospitality, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>No way!! We are the ones supposed to secretly organize a party and surprise you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eeeeh!? Is that really okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Of course it is!! We’ve been preparing for this for a week. Nico-senpai will also bring looots of fried chicken just for you since you love those so much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu can’t believe this is actually happening! My heart is overwhelmed with gratitude. Lanzhu might pass out!! And.... and Lanzhu can’t believe that Nico made those fried chicken just for me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kanata-senpai, Emma-senpai and Ayumu-senpai made a lot of food just for you, too. And guess what? Kasumin also made my special buns! Come on, Lanzhu-senpai, we’re going to the party. Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaa! Okay! Lanzhu will go! Then Lanzhu will treat my party as a way to thank all of you! We’ll have a party after the party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>But make sure to enjoy our party first, okay? Happy birthday, Lanzhu-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
